original_title: UFC on ESPN 32: Kattar vs. Chikadze
overview: UFC on ESPN 32: Kattar vs. Chikadze was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on January 15, 2022 at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States. A featherweight bout between Calvin Kattar and Giga Chikadze headlined the event.
title: UFC on ESPN 32: Kattar vs. Chikadze
